---
title: "00_all"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(knitr)

pipeline <- c(
  "01_load.qmd",
  "02_clean.qmd",
  "03_augment.qmd",
  "04_describe.qmd",
  "05_analysis_1.qmd",
  "05_analysis_2.qmd",
  "06_analysis_2.qmd",
  "99_proj_func.R"
)

for (f in pipeline) {
  message("Running: ", f)
  suppressWarnings(
    suppressMessages(
      knit(input = f, output = tempfile(fileext = ".md"))
    )
  )
}
```
